results.title: A bill to update the map of, and modify the maximum acreage available for inclusion in, the Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument.
results.short_title: A bill to update the map of, and modify the maximum acreage available for inclusion in, the Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument.
results.committees: Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee
results.latest_major_action: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 52.
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.)  (Sec. 1) This bill revises the title, number, and date of the map depicting the Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument in Colorado and increases from 6,000 to 6,300 the maximum number of acres that may be made available for inclusion in the monument.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.)  (Sec. 1) This bill revises the title, number, and date of the map depicting the Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument in Colorado and increases from 6,000 to 6,300 the maximum number of acres that may be made available for inclusion in the monument.

actions.description: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 52.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 115-38.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
